description.full_text:
Dizajn i proizvod
Acoustic LVT, all in 1 : -20 dB sound insulation without additional underlayer
Room impact absorption ( <65 db) : best performance of modular flooring
4 bevelled edges : realistic tiles & planks
Plank sizes : 245x1250 mm and short plank 150x750 mm for herringbone installation
Square tile : 500x500 mm
Protecshield : Matt surface
Ugradnja i održavanje
Protecshield with enhanced scratch and stain resistance : easy to clean
Maintained with a tackifier - removable
No dilatation joint, perfect dimensional stability
Primena
Ideal in applications where acoustic is a must : education, offices, hospitality, aged care, shops
Održivost
15% recycled content
Made in France 
100% reciklabilno
TVOC after 28 days < 10 microgrammes/m3: excellent indoor air quality
100% reach, phtalate free (excepted recycled content), formaldehyde free : healthy and safety
